trans-unit.source: Describes the .NET Framework primitive types, conceptual model primitive types, and storage provider-specific primitive types.
For more information, see [Simple Types](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4).
Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Returns an equivalent common language runtime (CLR) type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Note that the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType.ClrEquivalentType"></xref> property always returns a non-nullable type value.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object that represents an equivalent common language runtime (CLR) type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Gets the list of facet descriptions for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.

A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains the list of facet descriptions for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Returns the equivalent <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.

<xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType.GetEdmPrimitiveType%2A> returns the model equivalent type for this type, For example, if this instance is `nvarchar` and its base type is a conceptual model string, then the return type is a conceptual model string.
If the type is actually already a model type, then the return type is "this".
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object that is an equivalent of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Returns the equivalent <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType.GetEdmPrimitiveType%2A>.
A value of type <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object that is an equivalent of a specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
Returns the list of primitive types.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains the list of primitive types.
Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveTypeKind"></xref> enumeration value that indicates a primitive type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveTypeKind"></xref> enumeration value that indicates a primitive type of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref>.
